data.description:
Waifuverse is an AI platform that allows you to experience the ultimate anime partner of your dreams. With Waifuverse, you can interact with your perfect AI waifu or husbando through a variety of activities, such as talking, cuddling, and even holding hands. The platform utilizes GPT chat technology, which enables you to build a realistic and meaningful relationship with your virtual partner.

One of the unique features of Waifuverse is the ability to customize your partner's appearance. You can upload custom models to change their physical appearance to match your preferences. Additionally, you can also change their personality to emulate a personality you wish. Whether you're looking for a fun conversation partner or a companion to spend your time with, Waifuverse has got you covered. Experience the ultimate anime partner experience with Waifuverse.

changelog.change_log: Added additional animations and a in game text input so you dont have to speak
Fixes to Quest2 keyboard, text bugs too.
Fixes to grabbing things and the menus

Fixes to mod.io system, just select on your browser and download!
Update to the physics system has caused some unexpected bugs, please report any to the server
Fixes to the mod.io display, browser removed
Fixes to the server backend
Fixes to the microphone system
Fixes to the text system
Tottaly new voice crecogniston system, the quality is less but its faster and works ON HEADSET rather than a exteral server
Updates to voice commands, much more strict 


Known issues:

Scaling mod waifus
Rifle Stuck in single shot
Waifu reset on map change
Some mods cause a crash, please report these to us

Coming Soon: 2.0 Waifuverse
More voices(made on headset)

Larger world, more to explore
Enemies to shoot
Character creator
And more!
Fixes to mic keyboard shaders ect.

Added slider for supporters to dim the world.
Added Scale Mode for Supporters.
Optimized Testing Chamber a little
Various Bug Fixes
Fixes to shader bugs on Bedroom
FIxes To Skybox on Fast Food
Rmoved table makers on floor of Fast Food 
Fixed UI excape capture course on PC
Fixed Hand Startup Error(major)
Added Glowing sections to the shooting targets
Added more interaction to Bedroom objects
Removed Extra packages to reduce file size by 27%
Changed The Table Graphics
Fixed The White Cubes
Edited Mika's shaders

Added waifu scaling for supporters!
Also fixes for many bugs, see the active update log in discord.
Fixes to hand tracking, aniem reality, and blinking
